TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1025-1026
TEI.2.document_title: J. Iiams to Stephen F. Austin, 01-29-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: J. Iiams to Austin, January 29, 1825. Asks about land for two families wishing to move from East Texas to Austin's colony. Each has about 17 slaves.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1025-1026

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. Iiams to Austin, January 29, 1825. Asks about land for two families wishing to move from East Texas to Austin's colony. Each has about 17 slaves.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**location_mentioned*Sanja Cinto*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-29-1825">January 29th- 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p* *person_mentioned*Messrs Henry*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Micajah Munson*/person_mentioned* living at present *location_mentioned*on this side trinity*/location_mentioned* and being somewhat disappointed in their Settlement by the overflow of that *location_mentioned*River*/location_mentioned* desire me to enquire of you whether they can be admitted into your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned* and obtain the title of Land*/p*
*p*If they can be admitted they wish to have Lands near me on *location_mentioned*Cedar buyo*/location_mentioned* where there are no other Claims and they will commence settlement Immediately They are *person_mentioned*men*/person_mentioned* of Respectability having each a family and about 17 *person_mentioned*Slaves*/person_mentioned* each with good stock of Cattle etc., etc. They also wish to enquire whether more Land can be granted in proportion to the number of *person_mentioned*Slaves*/person_mentioned* They will in all probability be good pay for whatever Land may be granted them and I shall be happy in having them for *person_mentioned*neighbours */person_mentioned*please write me a line on the above Subject and if they will be accepted direct the survey as they are desireous to have it accomplished There are others wishing to apply in the same way if any more *location_mentioned*grants */location_mentioned*can be made*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. IlAMS*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
